name: Memory Dungeon
description:
Is a game that you have to memorize the dungeon and select the places that the bat has to pass through.

You can download the demo with 24 levels for free.

Pixel art:

https://pixel-frog.itch.io/pixel-adventure-1

https://pixel-frog.itch.io/pixel-adventure-2

https://trixelized.itch.io/kinda-cute-forest
